channel.title: Randoms
channel.description:
if(misc.random(3) == 0) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); teleportToX = X; teleportToY = Y; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Lucky! Off To Pking With Ya!"); } else if (misc.random(3) == 1) { teleportToX = X; teleportToY = Y; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Bad Luck! Your Training!"); } else if(misc.random(3) == 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); teleportToX = X; teleportToY = Y; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("You have the hardest skill to train LOL!"); } else if(misc.random(3) == 3) { addSkillXP(486000000, 4); teleportToX = X; teleportToY = Y; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("LOL You have HUGE LUCk! Hardest Skill Already Done!"); }
I forgot how to do randoms...i was looking for leScape pks tutorial, but its gone now, i didn't save it to my other tutorials. =(. Any know whats wrong? Errors:
.\Java\client.java:43: illegal start of type if(misc.random(3) == 0) { ^ .\Java\client.java:43: expected if(misc.random(3) == 0) { ^ .\Java\client.java:43: illegal start of type if(misc.random(3) == 0) { ^ .\Java\client.java:57: illegal start of type if (misc.random(3) == 1) { ^ .\Java\client.java:57: expected if (misc.random(3) == 1) { ^ .\Java\client.java:57: illegal start of type if (misc.random(3) == 1) { ^ .\Java\client.java:64: illegal start of type if(misc.random(3) == 2) { ^ .\Java\client.java:64: expected if(misc.random(3) == 2) { ^ .\Java\client.java:64: illegal start of type if(misc.random(3) == 2) { ^ .\Java\client.java:77: illegal start of type if(misc.random(3) == 3) { ^ .\Java\client.java:77: expected if(misc.random(3) == 3) { ^ .\Java\client.java:77: illegal start of type if(misc.random(3) == 3) { ^ 12 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Randoms
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

bakatool:

either random method doesn’t exist in misc.java or your putting the if else if’s in the wrong place.

Its fixed. i didn’t put it into a void. It works if it was encased in a void.

Read full topic

item.title: Randoms
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

either random method doesn’t exist in misc.java or your putting the if else if’s in the wrong place.

Read full topic

Try taking out the brackets before else if

item.title: Randoms

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Newb 2341:

Try using my tut, which can be found here.

I read it before, but i skimmed through it, this time i read it. No errors. Thanks.

Planning on using this when people log on, to fluctuate lag a little bit.

Read full topic
